title: Ravens lock up AFC North, No. 3 seed with win over Browns
description: The loss guarantees that Cleveland will have a top-three pick in the draft.
author: Jamison Hensley and Daniel Oyefusi

title: Ravens WR Flowers exits victory with knee injury
description: Baltimore Ravens wide receiver Zay Flowers, a first-round pick in 2023 who was named to this season's Pro Bowl, left Saturday's 35-10 victory over the Cleveland Browns after suffering a right knee injury in the first half of the regular-season finale.
author: Jamison Hensley

title: Man Utd 'too anxious, too afraid', says Amorim before Liverpool test
description: Manchester United's players are sometimes "too anxious, too afraid to play football" on the pitch, says boss Ruben Amorim.

title: The return of the 'old Man City'? 'Absolutely not' says Guardiola
description: Has Saturday's 4-1 demolition of West Ham marked the return of the old Manchester City? 'Absolutely not' according to boss Pep Guardiola.

title: NFL scores, live updates: Steelers and Bengals fighting for playoff position
description: The Steelers and Bengals still have plenty to play for in the final week of the season. Follow along with us!
author: Yahoo Sports

title: NFL Draft order 2025: New England Patriots lead race for No. 1 pick going into Week 18
description: Las Vegas and New York could use a new QB, and both Cam Ward (Miami) and Shedeur Sanders (Colorado) are expected to go early in the draft. Now it's unclear if either will be around by the time those teams pick.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Littler: I've got the ability to break Taylor's world title record
description: Luke Littler has told Sky Sports he "has the ability" to break Phil 'The Power' Taylor's astonishing World Darts Championship titles record of 16.

title: What makes history-maker Littler so special?
description: Luke Littler lifted the Sid Waddell Trophy for the first time on Friday evening in a moment we will surely look back on in the years and decades to come.
